ghostPost.title: Testnet#5 is open for review
ghostPost.excerpt: The Particl Team has released new features for community testing.
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: The Particl Team has released new features for community testing.
ghostPost.plaintext:
The Particl Team has released new features for community testing.
• Getting Started guide containing downloads:
Particl Testnet - Getting Started
[https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Particl-Testnet-Getting-Started-d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]
Particl Testnet #5 - 31st July 2017 Start Time : 14:30 UTC Purpose The purpose
of this testnet is to get feedback on…
[https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Particl-Testnet-Getting-Started-d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]
paper.dropbox.com
[https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Particl-Testnet-Getting-Started-d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]

> Remember to start daemon with `-testnet`
• New features and fixes:
 1. Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2
 2. Subtract fee from amount works from QT for all transaction types
 3. Coincontrol inputs and change address
 4. Rare unicode characters in recovery passphrase fix
 5. New Windows installer binaries for x32 and x64
 6. walletpassphrase silent fail fixed
 7. dumpwallet exports all keys in json format

tableOfContents.heading: The Particl Team has released new features for community testing.

prev.title: 2nd manual distribution of PART is complete.
prev.plaintext:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants
Wednesday’s PART disbursement went out today. Thank you for completing the
wallet set up, enjoy staking those tokens!

Still waiting for your PART?
Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] to see the
groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART
token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 9th. Don’t wait any
longer, set up your wallet
[https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1] 
and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?
The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our
#help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup [http://slack.particl.io/] 
and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin
across
the blockchain [http://blog.wizsec.jp/2017/07/breaking-open-mtgox-1.html].

next.title: 1st manual distribution of PART is complete.
next.plaintext:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants
In our last blog post
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] we broke
down the remaining contributors waiting for their PART tokens. Every Wednesday
we are doing a combined distribution to everyone who creates their Particl
wallet that week. Last night was our first batch and all over-funders
[https://particl.news/tokens-holders-and-next-steps-part-1-b9d7cd7e7887] and
approved claimants from our Community Initiative #1
[https://particl.news/a-community-driven-initiative-e26724100c3a] who set up
their receiving address should have their PART.

Still waiting for your PART?
Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] to see the
groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART
token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 3rd. Don’t wait any
longer, set up your wallet
[https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1] 
and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?
The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our
#help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup [http://slack.particl.io/] 
and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin
across
the blockchain [http://blog.wizsec.jp/2017/07/breaking-open-mtgox-1.html].

Thank you

Particl Team
next.html:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants

In our last blog post we broke down the remaining contributors waiting for their PART tokens. Every Wednesday we are doing a combined distribution to everyone who creates their Particl wallet that week. Last night was our first batch and all over-funders and approved claimants from our Community Initiative #1 who set up their receiving address should have their PART.

Still waiting for your PART?

Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017 to see the groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 3rd. Don’t wait any longer, set up your wallet and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?

The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our #help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin across the blockchain.

Thank you

Particl Team
